attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: student's should have to pay just a large and ridiculous amount of cash to get into universitys. they're prices are to high for students to afford, full-time undergraduates are liable to pay tuition fees of up to £3,225 a year. as you can see, this is too much and should be reduced.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
